name: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town uncover a mystery involving secret experiments and supernatural forces.

name: Money Heist
description: A criminal mastermind and his team plan the biggest heist in Spain, targeting the Royal Mint.

name: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned meth producer partners with a former student to secure his family's future.

name: The Witcher
description: A monster hunter named Geralt of Rivia struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

name: Squid Game
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in deadly children's games for a tempting prize.

name: Game of Throne
description: Hundreds of cash-strapped players accept a strange invitation to compete in deadly children's games for a tempting prize.
